tool_description: Manages a library of pre-defined and custom employee engagement questions organized by categories and themes.

action.description: Action to perform: create, retrieve, update, delete, or list

category.description: Question category (job_satisfaction, work_life_balance, management_effectiveness, career_development, communication, recognition, workplace_culture)

question_text.description: The actual question text for create/update actions

question_type.description: Type of question: likert_scale, multiple_choice, yes_no, text_input, ranking, or rating

question_id.description: Unique question identifier for update/delete actions

error_messages: Invalid action: Must be one of [create, retrieve, update, delete, list]
Invalid category: Must be one of [job_satisfaction, work_life_balance, management_effectiveness, career_development, communication, recognition, workplace_culture]
Invalid question type: Must be one of [likert_scale, multiple_choice, yes_no, text_input, ranking, rating]
Missing required data: question_text required for create action, question_id required for update/delete actions
Question not found: The specified question_id does not exist in the question bank
usage: Specify action and category. For creating questions, provide question_text and question_type. For updating/deleting, provide question_id. Use 'list' action to see all questions in a category.

questions.description: List of questions returned for retrieve/list operations

question_count.description: Number of questions in the specified category

last_modified.description: Timestamp of last modification to the question bank
